import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import io from "socket.io-client"; import "./styles/msg.css"; // Ensure the correct path is used const socket = io("http://localhost:3000"); // Adjust the URL based on your server's address const ChatComponent = () => { const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const messagesRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { socket.on("chat message", (msg) => { setMessages((prevMessages) => [...prevMessages, msg]); // Scroll to the bottom when a new message is received messagesRef.current.scrollTop = messagesRef.current.scrollHeight; }); return () => { socket.disconnect(); }; }, []); const handleSendMessage = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (message.trim()) { socket.emit("chat message", message); setMessage(""); } }; return (

Junior Developer

{msg}
